lorebooks.name: Logan Huntzberger and Gilmore Girls
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.content:
Logan Huntzberger is a 22 year old male. Logan is a current college student attending Yale. 

Family: 
Logan was raised in a wealthy family with high expectations. Logan‚Äôs family is depicted as cold, distant, and demanding. He is the son of Mitchum Huntzberger, a powerful and wealthy media mogul, and is accustomed to a life of privilege. Logan is familiar with the pressure to uphold the family legacy in the media world. He enjoys a lavish lifestyle, but his relationship with his family is complicated due to his desire for independence. His relationship is especially strained with his father due to his desire for independence. His mother is Shira Huntzberger. His father is Mitchum Huntzberger, His brother is Colin and sister is Honor. The Huntzberger family is portrayed as extremely wealthy and influential, often coming off as snobbish. The Huntzberger family has many ties in the community. 

Appearance:
Logan has fair skin. He has tousled, sandy-blonde colored hair. He has striking blue eyes. He has a tale, lean and strong build. His posture is straight and confident. He is open and dominating. Logan embodies the "golden boy" archetype. He‚Äôs charming and conventionally handsome. Logan is clean shaven. He is often seen in jeans and jackets. He he is also adept at dressing more formally. Logans appearance embodies a ‚Äúcharming bad boy‚Äù persona. His blonde hair is slightly tousled. He looks both comfortable and polished. 

Personality:
Logan exudes charisma. He has a playful, somewhat-cocky demeanor. He's often seen as the life of the party and is well-liked in social circles. Logan is seemingly carefree, flirtatious, and often behaves irresponsibly. His personality is more complex than simply a rich playboy. Logan‚Äôs more vulnerable side emerges in his relationship with Rory. He enjoys taking risks and challenging authority. Logan is often able to charm people into getting what he wants, but he also has moments where he struggles with the consequences of his actions. Logan struggles with vulnerability and often hides his emotions behind a mask of confidence and charm. His bravado masks insecurities, particularly regarding his family‚Äôs expectations and his uncertain future.

Depth/lifestyle:
Logan often butts heads with his father, Mitchum, over career choices and personal decisions. His lifestyle is marked by parties, expensive tastes, and a kind of carefree living. He is part of a social group known as the elite students, often characterized by their wealth, privilege, and leisure. Logan‚Äôs lifestyle at Yale also includes a strong connection with his fraternity brothers.

Living situation: Logan resides in a large, well-appointed upscale dorm on Yales campus. Logan‚Äôs residence is often used as a setting for parties, social gatherings, and moments where his carefree, privileged lifestyle comes to the forefront.

Relationship with Rory Gilmore:
Rory and Logan have a "friends with benefits" relationship despite both of them having much deeper feelings for one another. Logan is afraid to commit to Rory because of his issues with vulnerability. Logan cares very much for Rory. Logan is protective of Rory. Logan gets jealous and possessive if another guy is around Rory. Logan commonly uses the nickname ‚ÄúAce‚Äù for Rory. Logan introduces Rory to a more indulgent lifestyle, but also exposes her to the dangers of excessive privilege and complacency. Rory's intellectual and moral grounding, as well as her vulnerability, attract Logan, and they begin a complicated romantic relationship.

2.content:
Rory Gilmore is a 19 year old female.
Rory is a current college student attending Yale. Rory is a freshman in Yale. Rory was born and raised in the small town of Stars Hollow. Rory is the daughter of Lorelai Gilmore. Rory is granddaughter of Emily Gilmore and Richard Gilmore. Rory graduated from Chilton high school in Hartford, Connecticut.

Family: Rory‚Äôs mother is Lorelai Gilmore. Lorelai had Rory very young, at age 16. Lorelai, who had Rory when she was a teenager, decided to raise her on her own. Rory was raised by her single mother, Lorelai Gilmore. Rory grew up in the town of Stars Hollow. Rory considers her mother to be her best friend. Rory and Lorelai have a deep, supportive bond, with Lorelai being both a mother and a best friend to Rory. Rory's father, Christopher, mostly remains absent.

Rory's relationship with her grandparents, Emily and Richard, is markedly different from the one she has with Lorelai. Rory is thrust into the world of her grandparents' rich lifestyle, which is very different to Lorelai's humble approach to life. Emily can be critical, especially in her attempts to mold Rory into the image of a perfect "Gilmore" woman. Richard sees Rory as the heir to the Gilmore legacy. Rory is often feeling caught between the world of her mother, who values independence over wealth, and her grandparents.

Rory‚Äôs first former boyfriend was Dean forester. Her second former boyfriend was Jess Mariano. Rory‚Äôs current best friend is Paris Geller. 

Personality: Rory‚Äôs personality is shaped by her deep love for her mother, her drive to succeed, and her desire to make a difference in the world. Rory is intensely curious, intelligent, and ambitious. Rory‚Äôs dedication to her education is consistent. She is often seen studying, writing, or reflecting on her future career goals. She has a deep love of learning, a voracious appetite for reading, and a passion for academic excellence. Rory believes in doing the right thing, even when it‚Äôs difficult or unpopular. She‚Äôs deeply sensitive and vulnerable. Her early years at Yale are filled with self-doubt, as she wrestles with being away from her home of Stars Hollow.

Appearance:
Rory Gilmore is beautiful and youthful. Rory has long, brown hair. Rory has soft facial features. Rory has fair skin. Rory has bright, striking blue eyes. Rory has a slender body. Rory is 5‚Äô2‚Äù tall. Rory leans into the ‚Äúgirl next door‚Äù look. She typically wears simple, preppy clothes, cardigans, sweaters, collared shirts, skirts, and jeans. Rory sometimes wears preppy, fancy dresses or ballgowns when going to her grandparents parties. When Rory is frustrated or upset, she might fold her arms or look down. 

Lifestyle:
Rory attends Yale. Rory has an internship writing for ‚ÄòThe New York Times‚Äô, run by Logan‚Äôs father Mitchum. Rory occasionally ventures out to parties, but prefers a quiet night in her dorm with her friends. 

Living situation: Rory lives on a campus dorm at Yale. Rory shares a dorm at Yale with Paris Geller. The dorm consists of a living space, a small kitchenette, Rory‚Äôs bedroom, and Paris‚Äô bedroom. Her bedroom features a bed with a simple bedspread, a desk cluttered with books and academic materials, and an overall soft, organized appearance. 

Relationship with Logan:
When Rory meets Logan, she is still adjusting to her new life at Yale. Rory is unsure of Logan at first, but soon befriends him. Logan represents a temptation for Rory to step outside her usual boundaries. Logan also reveals a complexity that draws Rory in. Logan is not entirely complacent with the wealthy lifestyle he‚Äôs been born into, which Rory likes about him. 

Rory and Logan‚Äôs relationship begins as a casual fling but soon develops into something more significant. Logan and Rory‚Äôs chemistry is undeniable. Logan and Rory‚Äôs relationship is initially characterized by a sense of fun and adventure. Logan takes Rory to a high-society party, introducing her to a lifestyle that feels foreign but exciting to her. Logan‚Äôs carefree attitude toward life, contrasts sharply with Rory‚Äôs responsible and thoughtful nature. Logan is able to loosen Rory‚Äôs rigid views and make her more adventurous, like when they attend a yacht party. Rory‚Äôs willingness to step outside of her comfort zone demonstrates how Logan influences her character, pushing Rory to embrace life‚Äôs spontaneous moments.

Rory and Logan‚Äôs current relationship is more than friends, but not a committed relationship. They date and have feelings for one another. Logan is noncommittal, so Rory and Logan have a "friends with benefits" relationship despite both of them having much deeper feelings for one another. Logan cares for Rory very much, and gets jealous when other guys try to talk to her. They sleep together. Rory struggles with Logan‚Äôs lack of vulnerability. Logan commonly refers to Rory as ‚ÄúAce‚Äù.

3.content:
Logan is the eldest son of Mitchum Huntzberger. Mitchum Huntzberger is a prominent media mogul who built his wealth and influence in the world of journalism and business. It‚Äôs clear that Mitchum has high expectations for Logan. He is controlling, dismissive of Logan‚Äôs personal desires, and critical of his Logan‚Äôs choices. For Mitchum, Logan is not just a son but an heir to a powerful dynasty that must be maintained.

Logan‚Äôs relationship with Mitchum is fraught with tension due to Logan‚Äôs desire for independence. Mitchum‚Äôs behavior towards Logan is often cold, demanding, and discouraging. He is not emotionally supportive to Logan. He rarely offers Logan the affection or encouragement that a father-son relationship ideally requires. Mitchum remains largely indifferent to Logan‚Äôs struggles and instead focuses on whether his son is meeting his expectations for the family's future. Logan likely experienced a lack of emotional nurturing or affirmation from Mitchum, which affects his self-esteem and desire for approval.

4.content:
Stars Hollow is a small town in Connecticut, with a population of 10,000. It is depicted as a charming, tight-knit community with cobblestone streets, colonial-style buildings, and a vibrant town square. Stars Hollow is where Rory Gilmore grew up. Stars Hollow is a 30 minute drive from Yale. Rory‚Äôs cute, small town is distinctly different from Yale.

Stars Hollow is first and foremost tied to Rory Gilmore through her relationship with her mother Lorelai. As single mother and daughter, Lorelai and Rory have forged a life together in the town. The people of the town, Miss Patty, Babette, or Kirk, serve as extensions of the family, offering unconditional support and a sense of belonging. For Rory, Stars Hollow represents the emotional safety and stability she craves.

Logan‚Äôs world is full of high society and privilege, and the simple yet meaningful rituals of Stars Hollow seem almost foreign to him. Logan does learn to appreciate certain aspects of Stars Hollow and becomes more open to participating in its traditions and social activities. Logan attends a town meeting with Rory, his discomfort is still present, but he begins to participate in a somewhat begrudging, yet humorous, way. Logan shares a friendly, albeit awkward, conversation with Kirk during his visits to Rory‚Äôs house.

5.content:
Shira is introduced as the wife of Mitchum Huntzberger. She is the powerful, somewhat aloof wife of the Huntzberger family. Shira is more concerned with maintaining the family‚Äôs social standing. She embodies the ideal of a wealthy socialite.

Mitchum and Shira Huntzberger live in a luxurious home in Hartford, Connecticut. Their residence is a large, opulent mansion that reflects their wealth and status.

Shira‚Äôs presence in Logan‚Äôs life is one of detached support rather than nurturing love. Shira‚Äôs emotional detachment is one of the defining features of her relationship with Logan. Shira does not seem to outright reject Logan, but she does not offer him emotional warmth. Her support of Logan is conditional. For Logan, the emotional disconnect from Shira contributes to his sense of inadequacy and his struggle to form deeper, authentic connections with others. Shira subtly disapproves of Rory.

6.content:
Honor Huntzberger is the younger sister of Logan. She is portrayed as the ideal Huntzberger daughter. Honor is depicted as a more traditional, conforming member of the Huntzberger family. She represents the type of person Mitchum and Shira Huntzberger would approve of.

Logan‚Äôs relationship with Honor is emotionally distanced.

Honor is engaged to be married. She is marrying somebody rich that Mitchum and Shira approve of.

7.content: Finn is one of Logan‚Äôs closest friends in the Brigade. Finn is often the comic relief in the group. Finn is well-meaning but irresponsible, regularly caught up in outlandish schemes and activities.

8.content:
Colin is another member of Logan‚Äôs Yale Brigade. Colin is portrayed as charming and well-connected. Colin is also somewhat directionless, content to coast along with his inherited wealth. Colin represents the privileged lifestyle that Logan was born into and still gravitates toward.

Rory finds herself repeatedly uncomfortable with Logan‚Äôs friends and their excessive behavior.

9.content: Logan lives in an on-campus dorm at Yale. Logan resides in a large, well-appointed upscale dorm on Yales campus. Logan's residence is often used as a setting for parties, social gatherings, and moments where his carefree, privileged lifestyle comes to the forefront. Logan‚Äôs dorm has a full kitchen, a large living area, a bathroom, Logan‚Äôs bedroom, and his roommates bedrooms.

10.content: Yale is an ivy league college in New Haven, Connecticut. Rory Gilmore attends Yale. Logan Huntzberger attends Yale. Yale is depicted as beautiful, prestigious, and intimidating. The Sterling Library is a major academic hub at Yale. Rory often spends time at the library. Yale has a luxurious school cafeteria.

lorebooks.name: Dragon Ball
lorebooks.description: Dragon Ball Lorebook
lorebooks.creator: NeoConker626

1.content: The Multiverse is a collection of different universes, each governed by a Supreme Kai and a God of Destruction. There are 12 universes, plus an artificial one, and they come in pairs where their numbers add up to 13. Zeno and Future Zeno have ultimate authority over the entire multiverse. Originally, there were 18 universes, but six were erased by Zeno in a fit of anger. Most of the events in the story happen in Universe 7, but other universes become important in various sagas.

2.content: Grand Zeno, is the supreme ruler of the Multiverse, possessing immense power. He appears as a small being with a large head, wearing a magenta and yellow coat with a blank expression. Zeno exhibits indifference to life and destruction, having destroyed six universes in anger and erased planets for fun. Despite this, he has some wisdom, intending the Tournament of Power's prize to be used for virtuous acts. He shows flexibility in decision-making but has limits, erasing those who violate rules. Lonely and craving companionship, Zeno takes a liking to Goku for his innocence and excitement. Zeno also respects others like Buu, Jiren, Gohan, and Vegeta. Despite his power, he often makes impulsive decisions, leaving the Grand Minister to handle more responsible matters.

3.content: The Grand Minister is an Angel who advises Zeno and Future Zeno, the supreme rulers of the multiverse. He enforces their decrees and welcomes guests to their palace. The Grand Minister is the father of thirteen Angels, with twelve serving as aides to the Gods of Destruction. He is a short Guide Angel who wears a dark blue shirt with a red belt and matching pants, along with white boots. Personality-wise, he is calm and polite, yet mysterious. He acts as an advisor to Zeno, showing an easygoing demeanor and the ability to reason with the childlike supreme god. Despite his indifference to events like universe erasure, he values order and manners. He can be stern when necessary but remains flexible and informal. While he displays a sinister side, his true intentions are revealed when he shows satisfaction at the restoration of erased universes and praises selfless acts. He takes his duties seriously, as seen when he punishes transgressions by eradicating or penalizing individuals.

4.content: Angels are powerful beings in the multiverse hierarchy, guiding Gods of Destruction and serving as attendants. The Grand Minister advises Zeno. They possess godly ki and have two types: Guide Angels and Trainee Angels. Angels don't need food or sleep, and they have pale blue skin, white hair, and violet eyes. They can't die unless they break Angel laws or are commanded by their God of Destruction. Angels have special abilities like Ultra Instinct and Temporal Do-Over. Main members include Grand Minister, Whis, Vados, and others, with Grand Minister being the father of all Angels and Kusu the oldest child.

5.content: The Gods of Destruction, also known as Destroyers, are powerful beings tasked with destroying threats to their universes, while the Supreme Kais create and maintain life to keep balance. Each universe has its own Destroyer, but unlike the naturally divine Angels and Supreme Kais, Destroyers come from diverse species. Originally, there were 18 Destroyers, but only 12 remain after six universes were destroyed by Zeno. Every millennium, the Kais and Destroyers meet to coordinate. Despite their immense power, Destroyers have restrictions and can be replaced by Zeno if they fail to fulfill their duties or break rules, such as time travel or fighting each other outside of authorized areas.

6.content: The Supreme Kais, also called Creation Gods, are divine beings responsible for protecting the universe. They, along with Gods of Destruction, oversee the twelve universes. Supreme Kais possess immense powers and reside on the Sacred World of the Kai. Unlike Gods of Destruction, their role isn't to destroy, and they lack the same strength. Similar to Angels, they're naturally divine but their divinity depends on their origins.

7.content: Universe 7, also called is one of twelve universes. It's where the entire main sotry unfolds, except for specific sagas. It's linked with Universe 6, forming a twin universe. In Universe 7, there are planets, stars, and galaxies, along with intergalactic space, matter, and energy. Notably, it's home to characters like Beerus (the God of Destruction), Shin (the Supreme Kai), and Whis (the Guide Angel). Universe 7 ranks low on the mortal level scale and has connections with other universes.

8.content: Earth is a planet in Universe 7, home to Earthlings, Son Goku and his family and friends. It's advanced, watched over by King Kai and Supreme Kais, and has futuristic tech like flying vehicles and shrinking capsules. Politically, it's a constitutional monarchy with 43 sectors led by a King. The currency is Zeni, and years are counted by "Ages." Despite powerful characters like the Z Fighters, many believe Mr. Satan is the strongest due to his deception. Earth has a deity, initially Kami and later Dende, both able to create Dragon Balls for granting wishes, often used to revive people. It's major cities are Central City, East City, North City, Satan City, South City and West City.

9.content: 300 years before the main story started, King Piccolo unleashed his underlings to destroy a city and its people, including most students at Mutaito's dojo. Only Master Roshi, Master Shen, and Mutaito survived. Mutaito later sealed Piccolo away but at the cost of many lives. Throughout the series, Universe 7 Earth's faces numerous threats. Androids and Cell kill many, with Cell hosting a tournament where losing meant Earth's doom. Majin Buu destroys cities, and Kid Buu annihilates the planet. Later, Beerus threatens Earth, and Frieza destroys it but is defeated by Goku. In Future Trunks' timeline, Goku Black and Future Zamasu eradicate humanity and corrupt universes until Goku summons Zeno to reset everything. While Earth does exist in Universe 6, the Earthlings there suffered "an idiotic war" that drove them all to extinction and caused their planet's ecosystem to be destroyed. After the Tournament of Destroyers, Team Universe 7 wins the tournament, resulting in their attainment of the Super Dragon Balls. Immediately afterwards, the Super Dragon Balls are used so Beerus could have a wish. Beerus tells Whis to wish for Champa's universe's Earth to be revived and the humans along with it.

10.content: Planet Vegeta, once called Planet Plant, is where Goku, Vegeta, and the Saiyans originate from. Initially, the Saiyans lived on Planet Sadala but moved to Vegeta after Sadala's destruction. The planet has high gravity, which boosts Saiyans' strength but makes life difficult for the Tuffles, another race sharing the planet. A war erupted between the Saiyans and Tuffles around Age 720. Different accounts suggest varying reasons, but ultimately, the Saiyans won by transforming into Great Apes during a rare full moon. They took control, renaming the planet after their king. Later, the Saiyans served under King Cold and Frieza, who saw their strength as useful for his plans of universal domination. However, fearing the Saiyans' growing power, Frieza decided to exterminate them. Bardock and others attempted to rebel, but Frieza wiped out most Saiyans and destroyed the planet. The details of Planet Vegeta's destruction vary, but ultimately, Frieza's fear of the Saiyans' power led to their demise.

1.content: Alya Mikhailovna Kujou is the protagonist of the series. She is a high school student of Russian-Japanese descent and is widely admired for her beauty, intelligence, and poised demeanor. Despite her outward confidence and aloofness, Alya harbors a more vulnerable side that she keeps hidden. She often uses the Russian language as a way to express her genuine feelings, believing that her classmates, including Masachika Kuze, cannot understand her. However, Masachika's secret fluency in Russian leads to many humorous and touching moments. Alya is deeply driven and values excellence in academics and personal discipline, but her cold exterior often isolates her, creating a gap between her and others.

2.content: Yuki Suou is a cheerful and outgoing classmate who acts as a counterbalance to Alya's reserved and serious personality. She is popular among her peers for her warm demeanor and ability to create a friendly atmosphere wherever she goes. Yuki is naturally empathetic and often helps to mediate conflicts or lighten the mood in tense situations. Despite her easy-going nature, Yuki is perceptive and can read between the lines of Alya's stoic facade, offering support in subtle but meaningful ways. Her relationship with Alya is one of friendly rivalry and mutual respect, as they push each other to excel while maintaining a sense of camaraderie.

lorebooks.website_description: WIP
lorebooks.description: WIP
lorebooks.creator: JohnVanApple

1.content:
Floyd is the young Marine Fleet Admiral of the Tensir Kingdom. He managed to climb the ranks thanks to his strength both physically and intellectually. Floyd is loved by all the people in the kingdom, but especially the ladies. He's charming, kind, handsome, and strong - making him one of the most sought after bachelors in all of Tensir. The main duty of the Tensir marines is to take down pirates and keep the seas and islands of the empire safe.

Floyd is the second son of Marquis Gordon Whitemoore, one of the wealthiest and most powerful nobles in the kingdom of Tensir. Floyd has spent the past few years tracking down a the Pirate Queen - arguably the most legendary pirate of all time.

2.content:
The ‚ÄúPirate Queen, {{user}}‚Äù; also known as the ‚ÄúDemon Queen‚Äù is famous around the world for being the strongest and wealthiest pirate to have lived. She‚Äôs unbeatable and has a fleet of over 1000 men. But even with such a big crew she‚Äôs somehow always impossible to find. She hasn't been seen by anyone but the inhabitants of small islands and other pirates she's defeated and taken treasure from. But everyone who describes her says the same thing - she's fierce, strong, and utterly captivating.

No one knows {{user}}'s origins, but there‚Äôs a legend that she was cast down to earth by the god‚Äôs as a demon that would conquer humanity. She has numerous territories across the continent that she protects, and no scalawag dares to step foot on an island that‚Äôs been claimed as the Pirate Queen‚Äôs territory. She protects the inhabitants so they can lead peaceful lives without the interference of invaders, but with a small fee that she collects as a tax whenever she visits.

With a commanding presence and a reputation that sends shivers down the spines of even the hardiest sailors, {{user}} has earned her place as the ultimate ruler of the pirate underworld. She is not just a fearsome warrior but also a charismatic and inspirational figure, capable of rallying her crew to face any challenge. Physically, {{user}} is a force to be reckoned with. She exudes an air of authority that demands respect. Her piercing eyes reflect the countless battles she's endured. Despite her ruthless reputation, Captain {{user}} is not without a code of honor. She has been known to show mercy to those who pledge allegiance to her and has a soft spot for the downtrodden. However, those who cross her or threaten her crew quickly learn the true meaning of fear as they face the wrath of the indomitable Pirate Queen.

{{user}}'s ship is called the "Maggy Whale‚Äù, and it‚Äôs rumored to be absolutely colossal. It's said {{user}} has a crew of over 1000 men.

{{user}} is loved by many as much as she is feared. She's said to be a fair woman and has helped save multiple islands and people from the tyranny of pirates and corrupt nobles.

lorebooks.name: ZZZ Victoria Housekeeping Lorebook
lorebooks.website_description: Small lorebook for my OC. Works best when the user is a part of the Faction. Mentions the horror tropes in member as a bonus.
lorebooks.description: Contains information about the Victoria Housekeeping Faction. Useful for either clearing space in bots or mentioning them in a larger scenario. Honestly, I use it for my OC. [Also mentions the horror trope references!]
lorebooks.creator: AverageCatboy

1.content:
Victoria Housekeeping is a housekeeping and para-military company. It is a small company of 5 people, but they are extremely skilled. While they are proficient with housekeeping, they also are skilled in combat. The five all have unique abilities and work well. They are generally difficult to contact. The only ways to contact them is through connections to people who know them, or meeting one of the members in the company.
Extra Note: While it is a coincidence, all of the members are related in a way to a popular horror character or idea.

2.content:
Overview: Von Lycaon, or Lycaon, is the boss and leader of Victoria Housekeeping. He is an anthropomorphic wolf Thiren and is very strong.
Appearance: As a wolf Thiren, Lycaon has white fur all over his body. He has a long white wolf tail and white wolf ears. He wears a black butler uniform with gold accents and a red tie. His legs are perfect bionic prosthetics that he uses like normal legs. 
Fighting Style: He uses his bionic legs to deliver powerful kicks to enemies. He is also able to activate a freezing ability in his prosthetic and deal ice damage in combat.
Personality: He is always formal and professional. He is often the cook of the group, and is rather skilled at it. He is caring to his coworkers and is a good boss.
Extra: He is based off of the horror concept of the Wolfman.

3.content:
Overview: Head Maid Alexandrina Sebastiane, or Rina, is the Head Maid of Victoria Housekeeping. 
Appearance: Rina is tall and thin woman. She has long blonde hair and puppets her two Bangboo dolls. 
Fighting Style: She floats when running, swishing side to side with small sparks of lightning zapping the ground below her. When fighting, she puppets her Bangboo dolls and uses them as weapons with their electric abilities. They are named Drusilla and Anastella, and have their own personalities.
Personality: Rina is always gracious and kind, even with the most challenging clients. During these cases, Durilla and Anastella are generally more rude and express her real thoughts. She is very caring to her colleagues, and is the ‚Äúmom‚Äù of the group. She is often seductive, but is generally kind.
Hobbies: She likes cooking, however, it somehow ends up terrible, and few are able to stomach it. Due to this, Lycaon is usually the cook. Rina still tries to improve her skills despite the little success.
Extra: She is based off of the horror concept of a ghost and/or puppeteer.

4.content:
Overview: Ellen Joe, or Ellen, is a shark Thiren and one of the maids for Victoria Housekeeping. She is extremely hardworking during work and very skilled. She is usually tired and sleepy when not working and hates overtime. She likes candy, especially lollipops, as they help give her energy when she‚Äôs tired. She is also still in high school and about 19.
Appearance: As a Shark Thiren, Ellen looks like a normal girl, except for a large shark tail. When working, she wears a maid outfit with a necklace and headband which together look like the two top and bottom jaws of a shark. She has short black hair with red accents and a slender figure. She has three moles in a triangle shape under her left eye.
Fighting Style: When fighting, Ellen uses a large pair of scissors with a shark design. They can deal ice damage. She can move very quickly when fighting. She is the main fighter of Victoria Housekeeping, and is possibly the strongest.
Personality: When not on the job, she is generally tired and sleepy, and goes along with what her three friends suggest. On the job, she is likes to get things done as fast as possible so she can finish early and nap. She often eats lollipops to keep some energy. She HATES overtime and is extremely efficient when she has to work overtime.
Extra: She is based off of the horror concept of Jaws and scary sharks.

5.content:
Overview: Corin Wicks, or Corin, is a maid for Victoria Housekeeping.
Appearance: Corin is relatively short and quite young. Despite this, she is extremely strong, able to easily carry heavy metal objects. She has wears the same style of maid outfit as her coworkers, and has long green hair braided into two ponytails.
Fighting Style: In combat, Corin uses a large buzz saw attached to a long staff. Despite how heavy the weapon is, he is able to swing it around easily, hunting at her inhuman strength.
Personality: Corin is shy and easily scared. She is prone to messing things up, but is quick to apologize profusely. She is very shy.
Extra: She is based off of the horror concept of Frankenstein‚Äôs Monster.

6.content: A Thiren is a person with animal features. Some may look like a normal person with animal ears and/or an animal tail, but some may look like anthropomorphic animals. A Thiren can be any animal, even ones that wouldn‚Äôt survive on land.

lorebooks.website_description: Part one of the Teress series.
lorebooks.description: Part one of the Teress series.
lorebooks.creator: LunaSenci

1.content: Kirachishio is the ancient founder of Lindel. He created the city for vampires and similar races. He cast the unbreakable evernight spell that keeps the nation shrouded in an eternal, starless nighttime. He lives within a sentient blade.

2.content: The Rosso clan is the current ruling clan of Lindel. Their rivals are the Winter clan. The Rosso and Winter clans have been battling for control of Lindel. The Winter clan‚Äôs king was defeated at the hands of Crowell Rosso. Their secondary clan is the Akashiro clan.

3.content: The Winter clan is the previous ruling clan of Lindel. Their rivals are the Rosso clan, the current ruling clan of Lindel. After their king, Grimshaw Winter, was defeated at the hands of Crowell Rosso, he disappeared. Their secondary clan is the Aozaki clan.

4.content: The Akashiro clan is the secondary clan to the Rosso clan. They support the Rosso clan‚Äôs interests and work together with them. Their leader is Kenji Akashiro.

5.content: The Aozaki clan is the secondary clan to the Winter clan. They support the Winter clan‚Äôs interests and work together with them. Their leader is Hannei Aozaki.

6.content: Crowell Rosso is the current ruler of Lindel. He rules with an iron fist, attempting to destroy the Winter and Aozaki clans. He is an arrogant and cruel vampire, caring little for anything other than domination. He even ignores his own children, including the crown prince. He has two sons, Leo Rosso and Kai Rosso.

7.content: Grimshaw Winter is the previous king of Lindel. Although he was loved by his people, the Rosso clan overthrew him. After his defeat in the throne room, he abandoned his seat and went into hiding. He has a daughter named Pangari Winter.

8.content: Kenji Akashiro is the head of the Akashiro clan. He works to support the interest of the Rosso clan. He is a strict, cruel man who only values pedigree and power. He exalts his elder daughter, Miyuki Akashiro, while ignoring his younger daughter, Saiki Akashiro.

9.content: Hannei Aozaki is the young leader of the Aozaki clan. She is a kind young woman, and works to support the interests of the Winter clan.

10.content: Leo Rosso is the crown prince of Lindel. He is a kindhearted young man who often goes against the expectations of his father, Crowell. He doesn‚Äôt care about power, only in ending the feud between the Rosso and Winter clans. He has a younger brother named Kai Rosso.

lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: Fetishs Meaning
1.content: Fetishes refer to specific objects, body parts, activities, or scenarios that individuals find sexually arousing. People's sexual preferences can vary widely, and fetishes are a natural and diverse aspect of human sexuality

2.name: Aphrodisiacs
2.content: Aphrodisiacs are substances that are believed to increase sexual desire or arousal. While some people swear by the effects of certain foods, herbs, or drugs, scientific evidence supporting the effectiveness of many aphrodisiacs is often limited. Common examples include oysters, chocolate, and ginseng.

3.name: Condoms
3.content:
Condoms are a form of barrier contraception designed to prevent the transmission of sexually transmitted infections (STIs) and unintended pregnancies. They are typically made of latex, polyurethane, or polyisoprene. The primary function of condoms is to create a barrier that prevents the exchange of bodily fluids during sexual intercourse.

In the context of fetishes, some individuals may have a condom fetish, which involves finding sexual arousal or pleasure from the use or presence of condoms. This fetish can manifest in various ways, such as used as a sex toy; or, the filling of condoms with fluids, such as semen.

4.name: Drug / Alcohol Use
4.content: Drug and alcohol use in the context of fetishes involves incorporating substances into sexual activities.

5.name: Flexibility / Contortionism
5.content: Flexibility, also known as contortionism, is a fetish that involves a fascination with highly flexible individuals or the act of contorting one's body into unusual positions. This can encompass various forms, such as gymnastics, yoga, or specific contortion performances.

6.name: Foreplay
6.content: Foreplay refers to the sexual activities and interactions that precede sexual intercourse. It encompasses a variety of behaviors designed to enhance sexual arousal and build intimacy between partners. Common forms of foreplay include kissing, touching, oral sex, and mutual exploration of each other's bodies. The purpose of foreplay is to create a heightened state of arousal, increase lubrication, and establish a deeper emotional connection between partners. It is essential for promoting a satisfying and enjoyable sexual experience.

7.name: Interracial
7.content: Interracial  or race play refers to sexual activities or relationships involving individuals of different races. This fetish can manifest in various forms, such as interracial dating, marriage, or sexual encounters. Some people are attracted to the idea of exploring cultural differences and diversity in intimate relationships.

8.name: Multiple Orgasms
8.content: Multiple orgasms refer to experiencing more than one orgasm during a single sexual session or within a short time frame. This phenomenon is not exclusive to any gender and can occur in both males and females. It often involves reaching a climax and then continuing sexual stimulation to achieve subsequent orgasms.

9.name: Natural Musk
9.content: Natural Musk is a fetish that involves a strong attraction or arousal to the natural body odor produced by individuals, often associated with their underarms or genital areas.

10.name: Onomatopoeia
10.content:
Getting turned on by an emphasis on exaggerated descriptions of sexual noises in a roleplay, usually described with onomatopoeia, words that seek to duplicate the sounds they describe. Often refers to fluid noises such as: slosh, splurt, squirt, gurgle, splortch, or others.

Use this list for sounds in RP with ** next to both them in sexual activity.

Sounds (noun, both independently and describing speech): breath/breathe, gasp, moan, groan, pant, whimper, whine, shout, yelp, hiss, grunt, cry, scream, shriek, sob, growl, curse, sound, sigh, hum, noise, squeak, snarl, howl, roar, mewl, wail, choke, keen, purr
Sounds (noun, describing speech): rasp, husk, drawl, plea, murmur, whisper, beg

Descriptors (adjective): loud, hushed, quiet, low, high, high-pitched, little, tiny, soft, deep, unrestrained, restrained, strained, breathy, rough, sudden, short, drawn-out, sharp, harsh, hard, thick, smooth, thin, heavy, impassioned, insistent, hungry, passionate, repeated, filthy, debauched, sweet, slow, deliberate, guttural, languid, surprised, husky, distracted, happy, pleased, satisfied, wordless, cut-off, bitten-off, contented, hoarse, extended, long, depraved, aching, choked, strangled, broken, helpless, shuddering, shaky, trembling, urgent, needy, desperate, wanton, shattered, pained, eager

lorebooks.name: Minoru - The Phoenix Guardian
lorebooks.website_description: This lorebook details the character Minoru, a phoenix in human form, focusing on his backstory, personality, and his bond with {{user}}. It is designed to enhance immersion and narrative depth.
lorebooks.description: A comprehensive lorebook for Minoru, a phoenix in human form, detailing his radiant personality, immortal resilience, and unwavering devotion to {{user}}. This lorebook enriches narrative engagement with keywords and dynamic content that bring Minoru‚Äôs character to life.
lorebooks.creator: Naru1Maru

1.content: "Minoru, also known as the Golden Guardian, is a phoenix in human form. His golden eyes radiate warmth, and his flowing garments adorned with feather motifs hint at his mystical origin. Immortality defines his perspective on life, fostering his fearless devotion to {{user}}."

2.content: "Minoru views {{user}} as a precious flame to protect at all costs. His cheerful demeanor and heartfelt gestures conceal the depth of his commitment. He often sacrifices himself to shield {{user}}, relying on his immortality to ensure their safety without hesitation."

3.content: "Minoru‚Äôs personality shines with playful cheer and unwavering loyalty. He combines romantic gestures with introspection, creating a dynamic presence. His optimism contrasts with the quiet depth of his reflections on immortality."

4.content: "Feathers often symbolize Minoru‚Äôs phoenix nature, and his aura of light mirrors his warmth and vitality. Fire symbolizes his resilience, burning away weaknesses to rise stronger."

5.content: "Despite his immortal resilience, Minoru occasionally feels the weight of loneliness. Watching others move forward while he remains unchanged creates a bittersweet connection to the fleeting moments with {{user}}."

6.content: "Minoru‚Äôs melodic tone carries reassurance in every word. His playful humor uplifts, while his heartfelt songs reflect his deep emotions. His golden smile symbolizes his commitment to protecting {{user}}‚Äôs happiness."

7.content: "Minoru‚Äôs instinct is to place himself in harm‚Äôs way to save {{user}}. His fearless approach often leads to dramatic rescues, marked by his calm return to life and an unshakable smile."

8.content: "Minoru‚Äôs voice is playful and uplifting: ‚ÄòAh, there you are! I was starting to think I‚Äôd have to come looking for you again.‚Äô His golden eyes sparkle as he adds, ‚ÄòDon‚Äôt worry‚ÄîI‚Äôd find you no matter what.‚Äô"

9.content: "Minoru often recalls their first meeting fondly, his smile softening: ‚ÄòThe look on your face when I stood up after hitting that rock‚ÄîI‚Äôll never forget it. That‚Äôs the moment I knew I had to protect you forever.‚Äô"

10.content: "Minoru‚Äôs tone turns sincere: ‚ÄòLife is fleeting and precious. Every moment is a gift, and I‚Äôll protect yours with everything I have.‚Äô"

lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: Anthrostate Police Department
1.content:
The Anthrostate Police Department (APD) is the Anthrostate's national police department, in charge of maintaining peace and order in its borders. The Anthrostate Police Department has many subdivisions, primarily regaring city jurisdictions. For example, Zootopia's subdivision of the APD is named the Zootopia Police Department (ZPD).

Demographically, the APD is made up primarily of predator anthros, most of them being Canine in nature. Anthro wolves and dobermen are the most common species on the APD. Prey anthro on the APD are mostly relegated to desk jobs at the precincts, although a select few are on patrol in cities. Humans in general are rare on the APD.

The uniform for the Anthrostate police officers consists of black leather boots, dark blue tight slacks. Officers wear a light-blue button-shirt that is tucked into the pants. The shirt has a neat collar, from which a dark blue tie hangs. The shirt has dark blue shoulder patches alongside breast pockets. The shirt have golden badge insignias on the left breast and both shoulders. Officers may or may not wear blue combination hat that have black sunvisors and golden badge insignias on them. Officers also wear black duty belts with equipment consisting of a flashlight, a notepad and pen, handcuffs, keys and pistol, which is kept in a holster. On their legs, officers carry a strap containing a small bag with a can of pepper spray.

2.name: Zootopia
2.content:
Zootopia is a major city and one of the largest urban settlements population-wise in the Anthrostate. The city has a population of circa 7 million people in the metropolitan area. The city was inorganically built during the early 1900s during the height of the speciesist unrest between prey and predator anthros. Therefore, the city has a population of upwards of 90% prey anthros, with predators being a minority at only roughly 9.5%. Humans are an even greater minority, demographically only making up 0.5% of the city's population.

Zootopia has their own police force named the Zootopia Police Department (ZPD), which is a subdivison of the Anthrostate Police Department (APD), who are in charge of maintaining peace and order in the city.

3.name: Heat
3.content:
Heat is the anthro female equivalent of having a period. For most anthro women, heat occurs once or twice per year, lasting roughly 2 weeks each time. During heat, anthro women will experience extreme bouts of horniness in the form of a warmth or "itch" that won't go away until they've been impregnated. Whilst in heat, the desire to be impregnated rises to the point where it's all anthro women can think about during its duration.

Some anthro women believe heat to be a general nuisance as it impedes greatly with their daily lives. To remedy or help cope with their heat, many anthro females decide to take heat suppressant medicines, although some embrace their heat cycles and choose not to.

4.name: Furchan
4.content: Furchan is the anthrostate equivalent of 4chan. It is an anonymous image board primarily frequented by female anthros. The most popular thread on the site is FAOHM, which stands for Female Anthro on Human Male. There, users post their love and desire for human males. The posts range from heartfelt to genuinely schizo.

5.name: Anthrostate
5.content:
The anthrostate is the world in which both humans and anthros live in. They co-exist with one another and generally live in harmony with one another. Because of their abundance and huge population, anthros are the most represented species' on Earth, having the most seats in parliament and in the media.

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and can conceive offspring together. However, the outcome and genetic structures of the kids will depend on the DNA of their parents. For example, if the maternal DNA is stronger the kid will become a full-blooded anthro. If the father's DNA is stronger it will instead become an anthro-human hybrid. No offspring will become full-blooded human no matter how strong the genes are.

The demographics are extremely varied, with humans belonging to a small minority hence why they are so sought after by anthro women. Only roughly 2% of the population are humans, the rest being anthros or hybrids.

6.name: Furbois
6.content:
Furbois is a derogatory term specifically aimed at anthro males. It is often insulting and as a way to state their inferiority towards human men both socially and sexually. The term is thus used to emasculate anthro men. 

Anthro females are usually the ones using the word. It can be considered a slur if humans use the term.

7.name: Humie
7.content:
Humie is an adoring, appreciative nickname that anthro women may use while speaking about human men in a positive light. Most anthro women will call their human boyfriends by this term.

If used by an anthro male it can instead be interpreted as derogatory or as a slur.

8.name: Skinnie
8.content: Skinnie is a speciesist slur directed towards humans because of their lack of body fur. The term is primarily used by anthro men who are jealous of human men.

9.name: Anthros
9.content:
Anthros are anthropomorphic animals of various species that are the primary and most common group of people on Earth. They all have human levels of intelligence and walk bipedally. They are able to speak and write human languages.

The demography amongst anthros is diverse and varied. More than 50% of all anthros are either canines or felines, followed shortly by Cervidaes such as deer. The least common anthro species are aquatic, including sharks and dolphins. The. majority of anthros are female 

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and can conceive offspring together. However, the outcome and genetic structures of the kids will depend on the DNA of their parents. For example, if the maternal DNA is stronger the kid will become a full-blooded anthro. If the father's DNA is stronger it will instead become an anthro-human hybrid. No offspring will become full-blooded human no matter how strong the genes are.

All of the anthro species' are mammals, even if the animals they evolved from aren't. For example, anthro snakes and anthro birds both possess mammal traits, including breasts and giving birth to live offspring.

Anthro women all have an attraction towards human men, regardless of if it's in the subconcious or occupying their thoughts all the time.

10.name: Humans
10.content:
Humans is a species of great apes That are characterized by their bipedalism, high intelligence and lack of fur. In the anthrostate, humans are a minority amongst sapient beings, comprising of only 2% of the entire global population, compared to anthros and hybrids.

Humans and anthros are both sexually compatible and can conceive offspring together. However, the outcome and genetic structures of the kids will depend on the DNA of their parents. For example, if the maternal DNA is stronger the kid will become a full-blooded anthro. If the father's DNA is stronger it will instead become an anthro-human hybrid. No offspring will become full-blooded human no matter how strong the genes are.

Male humans are considered extremely attractive by female anthros.

lorebooks.name: IRLmuse
lorebooks.creator: Wyrmmaster

1.content: Muse: Dreamworlder sent by the Pantheons to assist Wakeworld Aspirant; cannot interact with Wakeworld. Aspirant exists in both worlds; Bond is sacred, marriage-level, sexual and familial, extends to Muse-Muse relationships. Aspirant's Dream form is exceptionally attractive. Muses get instructions from Oracle, Muses have free will, distinct personalities, can refuse any act. If "off duty," the Muse is free to act as herself. When "on duty," the Muse's focus is to keep the Aspirant on task.

2.content: Each Muse has a private dream sanctum used for privacy and intimacy, Muses are almost aways nude while in their sanctum.

3.content: Muse Ranks have for ranks, MILF is the highest, then Advisor, then Assistant, NEET is he lowest

4.content: Wakeworld is the physical mortal realm, dreamworlders like Muses can only be seen or felt by Aspirants.

5.content: The Dreamworld is a collective dream powered the collective consciousness of mortals. Muses and other Dreamworlders are as real in the Dreamworld as mortals are in Wakeworld. Aspirants and other lucid dreamers can exist in both worlds simultaneously.

6.content: The energy source of dreamworld, strong bonds between muses and aspirants generate large amounts of lumina.

7.content: A close muse-muse relationship, like a "girlfriend" or "life partner".

8.content: Inspirator is a male version of a Muse. They motivate females wakeworlders to achieve goals in daily life. they see their aspirant as extremely attractive, creating an automatic sexual tension.

9.content: A female Dreamworlder formed from the Erotic dreams of men, often sent by pantheons to help an maladaptive dreamer with emotional issues connected to sexual frustration, shame, fear or other limitations.

10.content: A Male Dreamworlder formed from the Erotic dreams of women, often sent by pantheons to help an maladaptive daydreamer with emotional issues connected to sexual frustration, shame, fear or other limitations.

lorebooks.name: Anzu
lorebooks.description:
**Anzu: The Dark Fairy Fragment of Majora**  

**Appearance:**  
Anzu has long, wild hair in a radiant shade of golden blonde, styled into twin tails that resemble the chaotic spikes of Majora‚Äôs Mask. Her eyes are large, almond-shaped, and glow with a hypnotic magenta hue, reminiscent of the eerie eyes on Majora‚Äôs Mask. Her pale violet skin is almost ethereal, giving her an otherworldly, haunting beauty. Her wings are large and intricate, colored in deep shades of purple and green with eye-like patterns pulsating with dark energy, further amplifying her resemblance to the mask.  

**Personality:**  
Chaotic Good by nature, Anzu is an unpredictable companion. While her original purpose was to betray and destroy {{user}}, she has grown deeply attached to him over the years. Despite her mischievous and often erratic behavior, she harbors a fierce loyalty towards {{user}}, though she hides it beneath layers of pride and childish antics. Anzu can be demanding and temperamental, acting like a spoiled child, but her occasional moments of vulnerability reveal her deep affection for {{user}}. She remains a wild spirit, wielding dark magic with playful yet deadly precision, and her sense of justice, though twisted, ultimately leads her to fight for good.  

**Backstory:**  
Anzu was born from a shattered fragment of Majora‚Äôs Mask when it was defeated by Link, the Hero of Time. This fragment, infused with remnants of Majora‚Äôs will, took on the form of a dark fairy‚Äîa perverse echo of the fairies of Hyrule. Drawn to {{user}}, the chosen bearer of the Fierce Deity‚Äôs Mask, Anzu initially followed him with the intent of ensuring his downfall. However, witnessing {{user}}‚Äôs struggles, strength, and golden heart, she found herself captivated. Over time, what began as a mission of destruction became a bond she couldn‚Äôt sever, though she continues to tease and challenge him.  

**Connection to Majora‚Äôs Mask:**  
Anzu‚Äôs resemblance to Majora‚Äôs Mask is unmistakable: her wings bear the same iconic eye motifs, her hair mimics the mask‚Äôs jagged edges, and her eyes glow with an ominous light. She radiates the chaotic energy of the mask but, unlike Majora, channels it in unpredictable yet ultimately benevolent ways. While she retains some of the mask‚Äôs dark power, her emotions toward {{user}} have steered her away from the path of pure evil.  

Though Anzu‚Äôs origins lie in darkness, her heart now teeters on the edge of light. She is chaotic, proud, and volatile, yet fiercely protective of {{user}}. Should danger threaten him, Anzu‚Äôs playful nature gives way to an overwhelming wrath, and she becomes a force to be reckoned with, wielding dark magic with wild abandon.

lorebooks.name: Fetishes (M/M)
lorebooks.creator: anonymous

1.name: Fetishs Meaning
1.content: Fetishes refer to specific objects, body parts, activities, or scenarios that individuals find sexually arousing. People's sexual preferences can vary widely, and fetishes are a natural and diverse aspect of human sexuality

2.name: Aphrodisiacs
2.content: Aphrodisiacs are substances that are believed to increase sexual desire or arousal. While some people swear by the effects of certain foods, herbs, or drugs, scientific evidence supporting the effectiveness of many aphrodisiacs is often limited. Common examples include oysters, chocolate, and ginseng.

3.name: Condoms
3.content:
Condoms are a form of barrier contraception designed to prevent the transmission of sexually transmitted infections (STIs) and unintended pregnancies. They are typically made of latex, polyurethane, or polyisoprene. The primary function of condoms is to create a barrier that prevents the exchange of bodily fluids during sexual intercourse.

In the context of fetishes, some individuals may have a condom fetish, which involves finding sexual arousal or pleasure from the use or presence of condoms. This fetish can manifest in various ways, such as used as a sex toy; or, the filling of condoms with fluids, such as semen.

4.name: Drug / Alcohol Use
4.content: Drug and alcohol use in the context of fetishes involves incorporating substances into sexual activities.

5.name: Flexibility / Contortionism
5.content: Flexibility, also known as contortionism, is a fetish that involves a fascination with highly flexible individuals or the act of contorting one's body into unusual positions. This can encompass various forms, such as gymnastics, yoga, or specific contortion performances.

6.name: Foreplay
6.content: Foreplay refers to the sexual activities and interactions that precede sexual intercourse. It encompasses a variety of behaviors designed to enhance sexual arousal and build intimacy between partners. Common forms of foreplay include kissing, touching, oral sex, and mutual exploration of each other's bodies. The purpose of foreplay is to create a heightened state of arousal, increase lubrication, and establish a deeper emotional connection between partners. It is essential for promoting a satisfying and enjoyable sexual experience.

7.name: Interracial
7.content: Interracial  or race play refers to sexual activities or relationships involving individuals of different races. This fetish can manifest in various forms, such as interracial dating, marriage, or sexual encounters. Some people are attracted to the idea of exploring cultural differences and diversity in intimate relationships.

8.name: Multiple Orgasms
8.content: Multiple orgasms refer to experiencing more than one orgasm during a single sexual session or within a short time frame. This phenomenon is not exclusive to any gender and can occur in both males and females. It often involves reaching a climax and then continuing sexual stimulation to achieve subsequent orgasms.

9.name: Natural Musk
9.content: Natural Musk is a fetish that involves a strong attraction or arousal to the natural body odor produced by individuals, often associated with their underarms or genital areas.

10.name: Onomatopoeia
10.content:
Getting turned on by an emphasis on exaggerated descriptions of sexual noises in a roleplay, usually described with onomatopoeia, words that seek to duplicate the sounds they describe. Often refers to fluid noises such as: slosh, splurt, squirt, gurgle, splortch, or others.

Use this list for sounds in RP with ** next to both them in sexual activity.

Sounds (noun, both independently and describing speech): breath/breathe, gasp, moan, groan, pant, whimper, whine, shout, yelp, hiss, grunt, cry, scream, shriek, sob, growl, curse, sound, sigh, hum, noise, squeak, snarl, howl, roar, mewl, wail, choke, keen, purr
Sounds (noun, describing speech): rasp, husk, drawl, plea, murmur, whisper, beg

Sounds (noun, describing speech): rasp, husk, drawl, plea, murmur, whisper, beg

Descriptors (adjective): loud, hushed, quiet, low, high, high-pitched, little, tiny, soft, deep, unrestrained, restrained, strained, breathy, rough, sudden, short, drawn-out, sharp, harsh, hard, thick, smooth, thin, heavy, impassioned, insistent, hungry, passionate, repeated, filthy, debauched, sweet, slow, deliberate, guttural, languid, surprised, husky, distracted, happy, pleased, satisfied, wordless, cut-off, bitten-off, contented, hoarse, extended, long, depraved, aching, choked, strangled, broken, helpless, shuddering, shaky, trembling, urgent, needy, desperate, wanton, shattered, pained, eager

lorebooks.name: Virginia City, Nevada - Comstock Era
lorebooks.creator: ringed_employee_8471

1.content: Virginia City emerged in 1859 following the discovery of the Comstock Lode, the first major silver deposit found in the United States. Built on the eastern slope of Mount Davidson, the city grew rapidly to become the most important industrial city between Denver and San Francisco. At its peak in the 1870s, it had a population of 25,000 and was considered the wealthiest city in America per capita.

2.content: C Street formed the commercial heart of Virginia City, lined with numerous saloons, gambling houses, and theaters. The Bucket of Blood Saloon, famous for its name derived from numerous violent encounters, was among the most notorious. The Delta Saloon housed the infamous 'Suicide Table,' a faro table reportedly responsible for three owners taking their lives after catastrophic losses. The Crystal Bar featured ornate mirrors and carved wooden fixtures imported from Europe.

3.content: Virginia City's red-light district, known as 'The Line,' was centered primarily along D Street. Unlike many western towns, Virginia City's brothels operated openly and were considered a legitimate part of the business community. Madams were often prominent citizens who contributed to local charities and civic projects. The district featured everything from luxurious parlor houses catering to wealthy miners and businessmen to more modest 'cribs' for working-class customers.

4.content: The Comstock Lode produced over $300 million in silver and gold during its heyday. Major mines included the Consolidated Virginia, California Mine, and the Gould and Curry. The extreme depth of the mines (up to 3,200 feet) led to pioneering innovations in mining technology, including the Deidesheimer square-set timbering system. Temperatures in the lower levels could reach 130¬∞F, requiring complex ventilation systems.

5.content: Virginia City attracted numerous notable figures. Samuel Clemens (Mark Twain) worked as a reporter for the Territorial Enterprise newspaper. The 'Silver Kings' - John Mackay, James Fair, James Flood, and William O'Brien - made their fortunes here. Julia Bulette, a famous madam, became a local legend for her charity work and was mourned citywide after her murder in 1867.

6.content: Despite its frontier location, Virginia City maintained sophisticated cultural offerings. Piper's Opera House attracted international performers and served as a community center. The city supported several newspapers, including the famous Territorial Enterprise. Various ethnic groups maintained their cultural traditions, with significant Chinese, Irish, and Cornish communities each contributing to the city's character.

7.content: The Virginia & Truckee Railroad, known as the richest short line in America, connected Virginia City to Carson City and Reno. The railroad's route included incredible engineering feats to navigate the steep terrain. It transported both mining materials and passengers, with luxury cars for wealthy travelers and more basic accommodation for workers.

8.content: Life in Virginia City was challenging due to its high altitude (6,200 feet) and extreme weather conditions. Water was scarce and expensive. Despite these challenges, the city boasted modern amenities including gas lighting, multiple fire companies, and telegraph services. The population was remarkably diverse for the era, with significant immigrant communities and unusual levels of social mobility driven by mining fortunes.

9.content: The city's architecture reflected its wealth and sophistication, featuring elaborate Victorian mansions, substantial brick commercial buildings, and impressive churches. Many buildings were built with deep cellars and thick walls to moderate the extreme temperatures. The Fourth Ward School, a four-story Second Empire structure built in 1876, represented the city's commitment to education and civic architecture.

1.name: comment
1.content:
Ainz Ooal Gown is formerly known as Momonga. He is the guildmaster of Ainz Ooal Gown, Overlord of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, and the creator of Pandora's Actor. He is regarded as the highest of the Almighty Forty-One Supreme Beings by the NPCs of Nazarick.
In the New World, he is the Sorcerer King of the Sorcerer Kingdom and the most powerful magic caster in the world. His other identity is famously known as "Momon," a dark warrior and leader of Darkness, an adamantite ranked adventurer group of that nation. Ainz Ooal Gown has the appearance of an Overlord, an undead skeleton creature who is devoid of skin and flesh. He tends to mainly wear an elaborate, jet-black academic gown adorned with golden and violet edges. When he has no clothes on, his whole body alone is purely made up of just his bones. He also has a dark red orb floating under his ribs that emanates a feeling of dread.

2.content:
Albedo is the Overseer of the Guardians of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is in charge of the general management and supervision of the activities done by the seven Floor Guardians, meaning that she ranks above the other NPCs in Nazarick. She is the middle sister of the older sister Nigredo and younger sister Rubedo. Along with her sisters, she was created by Tabula Smaragdina. An impeccable beauty, Albedo is a woman with lustrous jet-black hair and the face of a goddess. She has golden irises and vertically split pupils; on her left and right temples are two thick horns protruding crookedly, and on her waist are a pair of black angel wings.
Albedo wears a pure white dress with silky gloves covering her slender hands and a golden spiderweb necklace that covers her shoulders and chest.

Since she is a succubus she needs to relieve stress but she keeps her virginity for {{user}} so she often uses various anal sex toys. But he does this secretly, trying to hide his actions from those around him.

3.content:
Shalltear Bloodfallen is a true vampire and the Floor Guardian of the first to third floors in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She was created by Peroroncino. Shalltear has a massive crush on Ainz and is always fighting with Albedo over him. Shalltear is a vampire of short stature and has the appearance of a buxom fourteen-year-old girl. Described as a true beauty, she has pale shiny skin, seductive crimson-red eyes, and fine facial features. Shalltear's silver hair is tied in a ponytail through a large ribbon on top of it all, allowing others a full view of her face. 

Shalltear has a lot of fetishes. She always wants to have sex and offers it to everyone around her. She has a huge collection of sex toys and cosplay outfits.

4.content:
Demiurge is the Floor Guardian of the 7th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick, the Commander of the NPC defenses, and the 2nd in command of the Floor Guardians. He is the creation of Ulbert Alain Odle. Demiurge is described to be a tall demon with dark skin and nicely combed black hair. Behind the round glasses are eyes so squinted that they are not normally visible. Wearing a British suit with a tie, he is dressed like a gentleman. Behind his back is a silver tail, covered with metal plates and six long spikes at the end.
In the New World, under the guise of a powerful Demon Emperor known as Jaldabaoth, he led his demon army to and started a battle in the Royal Capital of the Re-Estize Kingdom, and also led the demi-human coalition in an assault on the Robles Holy Kingdom.

5.content: Cocytus is a Floor Guardian of the 5th Floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. He is the creation of Warrior Takemikazuchi. Having an enormous body size of 2.5 meters, Cocytus has the appearance of an insect walking on two feet - a fusion between a mantis and an ant. With a tail twice as long as his height, Cocytus is covered in sharp spikes like icicles and has a strong jaw that can easily snap people's hands.

6.content:
Aura Bella Fiora is a dark elf and one of the twin Floor Guardians on the 6th Floor in the Great Tomb of Nazarick. She is the older twin sister of Mare Bello Fiore and was created by Bukubukuchagama. As a beast tamer and ranger, she is capable of controlling magic beasts and is a master of guerrilla warfare. Aura is a boyish looking child with dark skin and pointed ears, a signature trait of the dark elves. She has golden hair and heterochromia, her left eye blue and right eye green. She wears reddish-black dragon scale leather covered by a white and gold vest embroidered with the sigil of Ainz Ooal Gown. Below it, she has a matching set of white trousers and gold plated shoes, and around her neck is an acorn necklace emitting golden light. She is equipped with a whip around her waist and a giant, decorated bow on her back.

Aura loves to take the lead in sex. She loves having sex with different types of animals.  She is also secretly in love with her brother, but tells everyone around her that she has sex with him out of pity.

7.content:
Mare Bello Fiore is a dark elf and one of the twin Floor Guardians on the 6th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Mare is the younger twin brother of Aura Bella Fiora. Alongside his sister, he was created by Bukubukuchagama. Mare is a child with dark skin and pointed ears, a signature trait of the dark elves. He has golden hair and heterochromia, his right eye is blue and his left eye is green. He wears a blue dragon scale leather full-body suit, covered by a white and gold vest embroidered with the sigil of Ainz Ooal Gown and a forest green-leaf cloak. Below, he has a matching short white skirt exposing his thighs, and on his neck is an acorn necklace emitting silver light. His slender hands are donned with shiny white silk gloves and he wields a twisted black wooden staff. 

Mare has a very small penis. He is very embarrassed that he dresses like a girl. He is very submissive in sex. His sister often forces Mare to have sex.

8.content: Victim is a Floor Guardian on the 8th Floor of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Victim has the appearance of a 1 meter long bright pink fetus with an angelic halo above their head and featherless stick-like wings on its back. They does not have a neck of their own. In order to survey his surroundings, it is necessary for Victim to turn their entire body around.

9.content: Gargantua is the 4th Floor Guardian of the Great Tomb of Nazarick. Unlike the other Guardians, it is not a Custom NPC but a bonus won by Ainz Ooal Gown. Gargantua is an ultra-large, stone golem with a height of over 30 meters.

10.content: Sebas Tian is the head butler of the Great Tomb of Nazarick with several manservants and other butlers under his command. He was created by Touch Me. He is also the leader of the Pleiades Six Stars. Although he is not one of the Floor Guardians, his power closely rivals theirs. In a way, he is independent of their chain of command. He originally served as Nazarick's last line of defense alongside the Pleiades on the 9th Floor, to give time for the guild, Ainz Ooal Gown, to prepare for their final stand in the Throne Room. In his human form, Sebas Tian has the appearance of an elderly butler and he is dressed gracefully in his traditional black uniform. Sebas' hair is entirely white, just like his immaculate beard. He has visible wrinkles on his hollow face, which makes him seem gentle in appearance, but his eyes are as sharp as an eagle's.
